item.title: [Python] Find out about the Python environment of Cinema 4D
item.description: #What is this? Cinema4D Python environment and c4d module I tried to dive It is also an extension of the C4D Python copy book distributed at the event before, It is also a continuation of this feeling…? Cinema4D, command line options on OSX, etc. http://qiita.com/it_ks/items/5c052366fb8d1c9952b0 before Here the module name is a bit complicated, so Speaking of “c4d” is Python module. For applications, write it as Cinema 4D.
